faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Seedance2 AI
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us at zyrliuwei@gmail.com

items.question: What is Seedance2 AI and how does it work?
items.answer: Seedance2 AI is an AI video generation platform powered by the latest Seedance2 model. Enter a text prompt or upload an image, and the AI will generate a video in seconds.

items.question: What video generation modes are supported?
items.answer: Seedance2 AI supports two main modes: Text to Video and Image to Video.

items.question: How long does it take to generate a video?
items.answer: Generation typically takes seconds to a few minutes depending on the length and complexity of the video.

items.question: What is the Seedance2 model?
items.answer: Seedance2 is the latest AI video generation model powering the platform, delivering better motion, detail, and realism.

items.question: Do I need video editing experience to use Seedance2 AI?
items.answer: No. Seedance2 AI is designed for creators of all skill levels with a simple, guided workflow.

items.question: What can I use the generated videos for?
items.answer: Use them for social media, marketing, product demos, creative projects, education, and more.

cta.title: Start Creating Videos Today
